channel.title: I need this fixed quick
channel.description:
No one seems to be helping me so here's the problem! HELP QUICK PLEASE!!!!!!
Ok whenever I do something that brings up a window let's say bringing up a shop it will d/c me.
What I mean by that is I go up to the shop owner (Varrock general) I right click the owner and press trade. Nothing comes up and I d/c
This problem also d/c me when I do the following.. ::bank command ::changecharacter (FIXED) DUNNO HOW Bring up shop Etc.
It's basically with everything that brings up a window. Except manually opening up a bank.
If it's the bank command can you give me a good bank command.
Also this isn't a major problem that I need fixed right away like the one above but also whenever I do the ::char and change the character log out and log back in it doesn't save anyone know how to fix that?
Thanks,

item.title: I need this fixed quick
item.dc:creator: @Cloud7Strife Cloud7Strife
item.description:
@Cloud7Strife wrote:

No one seems to be helping me so here’s the problem! HELP QUICK PLEASE!!!

Ok whenever I do something that brings up a window let’s say bringing up a shop it will d/c me.

What I mean by that is
I go up to the shop owner (Varrock general)
I right click the owner and press trade.
Nothing comes up and I d/c

This problem also d/c me when I do the following…
::bank command
::changecharacter (FIXED) DUNNO HOW
Bring up shop
Etc.

It’s basically with everything that brings up a window. Except manually opening up a bank.

If it’s the bank command can you give me a good bank command.

Also this isn’t a major problem that I need fixed right away like the one above but also whenever I do the ::char and change the character log out and log back in it doesn’t save anyone know how to fix that?

Thanks,
